code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSearch=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate(`/?search=${query}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Merchandise Mart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",children:"Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSearch,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search for products...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Search"})]})]});}export default Header;
